# TnaDown - Tnaflix Downloader

> Free online tool to download Tnaflix videos in MP4, WEBM, or MP3 format.

## About

TnaDown (tnaflixdownloader.site) is a free, browser-based video downloader for Tnaflix. No registration or software installation required. Works on desktop and mobile devices.

## Features

- Download Tnaflix videos in MP4, WEBM, or MP3
- Multiple quality options: 480p, 720p, 1080p
- No registration required
- Mobile friendly â€” works on any device
- Fast and secure with HTTPS encryption
- Completely free with no daily limits

## How It Works

1. Copy the video URL from Tnaflix
2. Paste the URL into the input field on our homepage
3. Click "Extract & Download"
4. Choose your preferred format and quality
5. Click Download to save the video

## Pages

- [Home](https://tnaflixdownloader.site/): Main download tool
- [Tutorial](https://tnaflixdownloader.site/tutorial): Step-by-step download guide
- [Contact](https://tnaflixdownloader.site/contact): Contact information and legal notice
- [Terms of Use](https://tnaflixdownloader.site/terms-of-use): Terms and conditions
- [Privacy Policy](https://tnaflixdownloader.site/privacy-policy): How we handle user data

## API

- POST /api/extract: Accepts a JSON body with a `url` field, returns video title, duration, and available download formats.

## Legal

This tool is for personal use only. Users are responsible for complying with applicable copyright laws. We do not host or store any video content.
